name: SuperSponge Rehydrated Prototype
description:
It's a not-so beloved game remade for the newer generation! This game is still in development, so don't expect anything to really stay. I've switched back to construct 2 because I felt like GDevelop isn't really the type to make a remake.

Controls:

Left & Right Arrows/Joystick: Move

Z/B: Jump

Enter/Start Pause

not all the game has been programmed to fully use gamepad support, like the menus.

Set your clocks for the release date, cuz this is gonna be an Ild one!

Credit to River347 on Discord for 2nd to last Spongebob sprite on the title screen.
